LIBFLIAPI FLIGetFilterCount

(flidev_t dev, long* filter)

Get the filter wheel filter count of a given device.

Documentation

Get the filter wheel filter count of a given device. Use this function to get the filter count of filter wheel dev.
Parameters:
dev - Filter wheel device handle.
filter - Pointer to where the filter wheel filter count will be placed.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.

Alphabetic index
